title: Printful
shortDescription: Leading print-on-demand platform for custom products. Create and sell custom apparel, accessories, and home goods with zero inventory risk.
longDescription: Printful is the industry leader in print-on-demand fulfillment, enabling entrepreneurs to sell custom products without holding inventory. With fulfillment centers across North America, Europe, and Asia, Printful ensures fast delivery to customers worldwide—crucial for cross-border sellers building global brands. The product catalog spans over 350 items including t-shirts, hoodies, phone cases, posters, mugs, and home decor. The built-in Design Maker lets you create professional designs without graphic design skills, while the mockup generator produces stunning product images for your store. Printful's branding options include custom labels, pack-ins, and branded packaging, helping you build a memorable brand experience. Integration with major platforms like Shopify, Etsy, Amazon, WooCommerce, and more means orders flow automatically to Printful for production and shipping. The platform handles everything from printing to packing to shipping, including customs documentation for international orders. Quality is consistently high with strict quality control processes. For sellers testing new designs or building a brand, Printful eliminates the financial risk of traditional inventory models.

faqs.question: How much does Printful cost?
faqs.answer: Printful has no monthly fees—you only pay for products when orders come in. Product costs vary: basic t-shirts start around $9-12, hoodies $20-25, and posters $5-10. Shipping is calculated separately. The Printful Growth subscription at $24.99/month offers up to 33% product discounts for higher-volume sellers.

faqs.question: What's the profit margin with Printful?
faqs.answer: Typical profit margins range from 30-50% depending on the product and your pricing strategy. A t-shirt costing $12 from Printful might sell for $25-30, yielding $13-18 profit. Premium products and strong branding can command higher prices and margins.

faqs.question: How long does Printful take to ship?
faqs.answer: Production typically takes 2-5 business days, plus shipping time. Domestic US orders usually arrive within 4-8 business days total. International shipping varies from 6-20 business days depending on destination. Printful's global fulfillment network helps reduce delivery times for international customers.
